title: Interpretation of a dream about coughing by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a cough in a dream by Ibn Sirin, and seeing a cough in a dream indicates fear of the future and fear of poverty and financial losses, so coughing indicates trouble and anxiety. Many people suffer from coughing, and this is something we are accustomed to, but if you see a cough in a dream, then this In fact, it has many signs, which we will learn about through this article. Interpretation of a dream about coughing by Ibn Sirin. As Ibn Sirin says in the book of interpretation about seeing a cough in a dream, whoever sees himself coughing violently shows his pain and sorrows, and the merchant who sees himself coughing in his dream shows his fear. Of his work and money. Of loss, and he fears poverty for himself. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing vomiting in a dream for a married, pregnant, or single woman. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person coughing. A dead person’s cough is a sign of complaint and pain and his need for prayers and charity. But if the dead person appears after coughing, this indicates trouble and tension. Where do you see a dream about The deceased is an indicator of his status and status. Interpretation of a cough for a married woman: Seeing a married woman coughing in a dream is an indication of the severity of her fatigue in real life. Seeing a married woman taking cough medicine in a dream means that fears are repeated over and over again. A married woman seeing someone she knows suffering from a cough means That this person blames her for misbehavior. Seeing a sick woman with a cough indicates that she has recovered from the disease. Read also: Interpretation of dreams about seeing a hospital in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of a dream about coughing for a single woman. A severe and continuous cough also indicates that the viewer is losing his health. Seeing unmarried women coughing in The dream is a sign of complaints and dissatisfaction with their lives. Seeing a cough for unmarried women indicates excessive psychological exhaustion as a result of emotional or financial crises. Coughing in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates instability in her life. A constant cough also indicates family disputes. Cough in a dream For a divorced woman, seeing a cough in her fingertips has many meanings. The vision indicates problems, troubles, and instability. If a divorced woman sees that she is coughing in her dream, this indicates the instability of her life at all social, familial, and professional levels. The vision also shows the worries that she faces at her work, in her social relationship with her friends, or her suffering with divorced women. Interpretation of a dream about a sunrise with food. Sharing a dream is one of the visions that can indicate fatigue, pain, worry, anxiety, and the sign. Seeing inside a dungeon, eating, orgasm in a dream is about the adversities and difficulties that an unmarried girl faces. Or a married woman. A man or a woman, and seeing a lump and severe pain in the neck in the dream of an unmarried young man is a sign of his failure to achieve the desires and dreams that he wanted to achieve, and his stumbling in studies if he is a student. Interpretation of coughing up blood in a dream: Seeing a dreamer coughing up blood indicates a major problem in his life as well. It indicates that there is a big matter or a disaster that the fortuneteller is going through. Interpretation of coughing with phlegm in a dream: Coughing up phlegm in a dream indicates the difficulties that one faces.

title: Interpretation of seeing yourself drinking alcohol and then spitting it out in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of drinking alcohol and then spitting it out in a dream. The dream is similar to a group of fantasies that the sleeper feels in his sleep, as the visions differ from one person to another, and perhaps the most important of them is the vision of drinking alcohol. . It is one of the unknown dreams that causes anxiety and surprise, and also carries associations and suggestions. A lot depends on the psychological and social state of that person. What is the interpretation of seeing yourself drinking alcohol and then spitting it out in a dream? What is the interpretation of seeing alcohol in a dream for a single woman? Alcohol is one of the drinks forbidden by Islamic law, because it makes a person lose his mind and senses, but there is a great demand for it, and it is considered one of the dreams that comfort her in her sleep. This has many connotations. The interpretation of seeing alcohol in a dream for a single woman was as follows: Seeing alcohol in a dream indicates stability in her life in the coming days. It is a sign that she is close to a good man and that her life will be happy. When an unmarried girl sees that she is drinking alcohol and getting drunk, this indicates On her weakness. It can be a sign of loss of money and inability to fulfill desires. What does drinking alcohol in a dream mean for a married woman? The dream of drinking alcohol can be an indication of the good condition and good that awaits the dreamer, and it can bring evil and evil to him, based on the dream Who saw it, and about this hadith, here is the meaning of drinking. Wine in a dream for a married woman: Seeing yourself drinking wine and drinking indicates unpleasant news. A sign of the deterioration of her life and her inability to deal with problems. An indication of the instability of her family life. It may be a warning to her that her husband is hiding something from her. Interpretation of a dream about drinking wine for a woman Divorcee: Seeing alcohol for a divorced woman has many connotations. It is one of the unwanted dreams, and it could be a warning of something that will happen soon. In light of that, here is the interpretation of a dream about drinking alcohol for divorced women: Drinking to the point of intoxication is a sign of bad character, religion, and reputation. It may be an indication of Her meeting with a man who will compensate her for the above. Seeing selling alcohol in a dream indicates hypocrisy and lack of debt. If you see yourself drinking alcohol in a dream, this may indicate prohibited, suspicious money. Dreaming about drinking alcohol and then spitting it out. Although alcohol is forbidden in this world, it is one of the types of drinks in Paradise. The difference is that alcohol in Paradise does not deprive the mind, and the following is a vision of drinking alcohol and then spitting it out. Dream: Drinking alcohol and then spitting it indicates a lot of money. It can be a sign of immorality, immorality, and frequent sins and disobedience. Suggesting worries, problems, and instability. The sleeper often sees dreams during his sleep, as interpretation scholars have intensified their efforts to try to interpret them, and the dream of drinking alcohol is one of the dreams Which some people care about, and the interpretations and signs of this vision differ from one person. . In others, the interpretation of drinking alcohol has already been mentioned on several occasions.

title: Interpretation of flour in a dream by Ibn Sirin and leading scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing flour in a dream: Many people can see in a dream seeing flour in a dream, but the vision differs from one person to another according to the state of the vision that the person was in, and the interpretation varies according to the person’s state on earth, finally, in the social position in which he is. Accurate interpretations For dreams: Interpretation of flour in a dream by Ibn Shaheen: If a person sees in his dream that he is shopping to buy an amount of white flour, this means that he will completely give up his future and buy the world by any means. If a person sees in his dream that he is eating an amount of flour but does not find it in the bread, then this Evidence that in the near future he will suffer from serious financial difficulties and lead to extreme poverty. Ibn Sirin says that when an unmarried girl dreams that she has a large quantity of bags of flour and that she keeps them and tries to maintain them, this means that this girl will find a new job that she was looking for. A long time. Flour in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqIf an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is buying a quantity of white flour, this means that she will obtain great happiness, happiness and ease in her life in the coming short period. If a married woman sees in her dream that she has a very large quantity of flour And that it represents a great burden for her, this is evidence that she will attain a very great amount of goodness and blessing, which can be represented in either a new child or an abundant diet. Interpretation of flour in a dream by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin showed that seeing a palm of flour in a dream is a sign that the dreamer He will marry a girl who belongs to a well-known family, and he indicated the explanation that her origin will not be as normal as any family, but it will be so. To be honorable and rare, and this will make the dreamer happy, because he will belong to the members of this ancient family, and his children will later be among its members. As for the dreamer seeing in his dream that he is planting wheat or wheat from which we make flour, this means that his work is permissible, and it is a special work, so he sees A sign that he considers a permissible profit in what pleases God, but he does not do it. He took more than what was permitted, so his wealth would be free of taboos, and blessings would be abundant in his children and family. Flour in a dream for a single woman. None of us knows what his next share in marriage will be, so everyone prays to God to honor him with men and women who enjoy great religion and good morals. But if an unmarried woman sees flour in a dream, the vision will indicate that her marriage will be to a wealthy young man, and this will open the doors of happiness for her, especially if he is financially and morally wealthy. Interpreters pointed out that the amount of flour in a dream is an indicator that may not interest many dreamers, but it is Important in interpretation. If he sees a cup of flour, the interpretation will differ from someone who sees the whole place filled with flour. We explain the most important deeds for which the fortuneteller is rewarded with multiple amounts of good deeds. The first task: which is prayer. There is no good deed in this world that is stronger than prayer and faith in God to the utmost extent, and striving to earn the greatest amount of good deeds that God gives to His servants. The second task: Search

title: Interpretation of a dream about luggage

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about luggage by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dreams: Luggage in a dream: It indicates the beginning of a new happy life. A person’s dream of seeing gilded luggage is evidence of the problems and fears that he is exposed to, but he gets rid of them quickly. As for seeing the change of old luggage with the new, it is evidence of the best material conditions in which he is located. But If a person sees in a dream that he is changing the position of luggage in the house, this indicates an extensive diet and a lot of money. Interpretation of seeing furniture for Nablus Carrying luggage in a person’s dream is a sign of abundant sustenance and kindness. Seeing buying new furniture is evidence of the money he obtains from new sources. Buying old furniture in a dream indicates that the dreamer is wasting his time on useless things. Interpretation of a dream about seeing luggage for single women. Seeing a dream about luggage in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence of a positive change in her life. But if she dreams that she is moving her room’s furniture from her family’s home to another Marital, these dreams are an indication of her marriage in the near future. Seeing a married woman’s luggage. Seeing white luggage in a dream indicates a good and better financial condition. A lot of luggage in a married woman’s dream indicates kindness and an extensive diet. Getting rid of old furniture in a dream is a sign of Marital happiness if it is replaced with a new one. Seeing buying old furniture is evidence of many problems and fears. Interpretation of a dream about luggage for a pregnant woman. Buying new furniture by a pregnant woman is an indication of the safety of the newborn and the possibility of giving birth. If he sees that he is buying a chair in a dream, this indicates that he He will have a child. If he sees that he is buying a table, this indicates the girl’s livelihood. Interpretation of a dream about luggage for a man: Seeing a dream about white luggage in a dream for a man is a sign of kindness and obtaining a lot of money in the near future. A dream about a white sofa indicates that an unmarried young man will get married Soon. Seeing an old sofa in a dream is a sign that you are wasting money and not benefiting from it. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to your marital status in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Escaping from war in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of escaping from war by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of escaping from war in a dream. It indicates the success and superiority that the dreamer has. If one sees in a dream that someone is pursuing him during war, this indicates that he is suffering from envy and hatred from some people in his life. Dreaming of escaping from the police during War is a sign of failure that the dreamer is experiencing. Seeing a dream of escaping from war from Nabulsi. Seeing a dream of escaping from within the war between people and rulers is evidence of the prosperity that the dreamer is experiencing. Seeing him escaping from enemies in war is evidence of the problems that the dreamer will fall into. If one dreams that he is running to war And the dogs are chasing him, this indicates that there are many enemies in his life waiting for him. A dream about escaping from war freely. A girl’s dream of seeing herself escaping from war and the presence of someone chasing her indicates the troubles and problems she faces. If an unmarried girl sees someone pursuing her in war and she tries to escape, but he manages Of escaping from it, this vision shows the crises that this girl will go through, but she will soon get rid of them. Escaping from war in a dream indicates bad news. If a girl sees a war in a dream, but does not participate in it, this indicates bad events and problems. Interpretation Escaping from war for a married womanIf a married woman dreams of escaping from her husband and stabbing her in the stomach, this indicates the birth of a woman. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is fighting with a sword, this indicates that she will become pregnant soon. A dream of escaping from war for a pregnant womanWar in general in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence On the occurrence of changes at work. Seeing war between parents or some family members is a sign of a problem and a difficult birth. title: Interpretation of seeing a bathroom in a dream for a man and a woman

preview.html: The opinions of dream interpretation scholars unanimously agree that seeing a bathroom in a dream is one of the praiseworthy and promising visions for an individual of happiness, pleasure, living and blessings. That is why today we will give you all the correct interpretations of seeing washing in a dream, washing from impurities in a dream, and washing in a dream For a single woman, washing in a dream for a married woman, and washing in a dream for a man. Washing in a dream Seeing a bathroom in a dream is one of the fortuneteller’s favorite and praiseworthy symbols, as it is a sign of his good circumstances and salvation from crises. Seeing washing in dreams can be a sign of the nearness of The dreamer from his Lord, his behavior on the path of obedience and worship, and his commitment to the matters of his religion. Bathing in a dream also symbolizes the death of worry and anxiety, alleviation of distress, and comfort after distress. The interpretation of a dream about washing in a dream also indicates the fulfillment of desires, desires, and aspirations. The interpretation of washing in a dream also symbolizes Abundance of livelihood, abundance of money, profits, and profits. Washing clothes in a dream in front of people is a good omen, and if clothes are not worn and washed in front of people, then there is no good in it. Washing from impurity in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s distance from sins, transgressions, and misdeeds. The interpretation of seeing washing in a sick dreamer’s dream is good news. With his recovery and illness. Seeing a prisoner or a sad fortune teller in a dream is a sign of getting out of prison and releasing distress. Washing with soap and water in a dream is a sign of good behavior, morals, and purity. Bathing in a single person’s dream is an indication of his approaching marriage. Seeing washing in a dream for an unmarried woman portends With her blessings and obtains a lot of sustenance, it may be good news for her in marriage. Likewise, seeing a married woman bathing in a dream symbolizes the resolution of crises, disagreements, and disagreements that she has suffered from. Bathing in a dream for a married woman portends her blessings in diet, money, and good conditions for her family. As for bathing in a pregnant woman’s dream, it portends an easy and smooth birth and a complete recovery for her and the newborn, God willing. Seeing a divorced woman bathing in a dream means that God will bless her by marrying a sincere person who will compensate her for her past suffering. See also: Interpretation of a dream about impurity Repeated dream of intercourse in a dream Bathing in dirt in Dream: As for the interpretation of a dream about washing from impurities in a dream, it is one of the most promising visions. Washing from impurity in a dream symbolizes repentance from sins and adherence to the path of purity, righteousness, and honoring one’s parents. It can also symbolize the fulfillment of desires and ambitions, and you may hear some good news in the coming period. It could Taking an earthen bath in a dream is a sign of recovery from illness, the removal of worry and anxiety, and alleviation of distress. The interpretation of a dream about washing from impurities in a dream for a debtor is a sign of fulfilling his debts and facilitating his affairs. Bathing in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about washing in a dream for a single woman is one of the promising symbols For urgent marriage. Bathing in a single woman’s dream may symbolize her freedom from worries and worries

title: Interpretation of seeing a bag in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, and a pregnant woman has different interpretations

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing a bag in a dream for unmarried and pregnant women has different interpretations. A wallet is a place to keep money, things and small important details that he wants to carry with him permanently. Seeing a wallet in a dream can indicate different meanings than the real and true meaning of the wallet and reflects a picture of the circumstances and events that the viewer is currently going through. In this article, we will learn together about its interpretation of seeing a wallet in a dream for a married, single, and pregnant woman with different interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a bag in a dream for a woman Single If an unmarried girl sees that someone she knows has given her a new wallet and asks her to keep it with her until she returns to receive it again, this vision is a message to the girl that someone will entrust her with a relevant secret. she has. On his life, this girl must have confidence and keep this secret and not reveal it to anyone or under any circumstances. A good girl dreams of seeing in her sleep that she found a wallet and returned it to its owner. This vision symbolizes this girl’s morals and honesty. Interpretation of a dream about losing a wallet in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream a wallet full of money and in new and good condition, then this vision symbolizes the positive ideas that this woman has about her life and her view of the world in general, as well as showing She is a compassionate and loving person who works to make her family happy. And if she sees in her dream that she is picking up a bag from the street lying on the ground, then this dream means that God Almighty will grant her and her husband a lot of goodness. One of the praiseworthy interpretations of seeing a bag in a dream for a married woman is that it indicates security. And the peace that a woman feels with her husband. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a serial killer in a dream for a pregnant woman: One of the very meaningful visions for a pregnant woman is that she sees in her dream that she is picking up a bag from the street. This dream means that this woman will be tested by God on the extent of her honesty and ability to bear responsibility, and it is a sign of being careful about what she does with words and deeds. And if the dream she saw was of her husband giving her a new wallet, then this vision warns her that God Almighty will facilitate childbirth for her and she will give birth to her son. Without suffering from any health problems, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a wallet as a gift in a dream: Whoever sees in a dream that someone is giving him a wallet as a gift, then this vision portends goodness to come for the pioneer, and if the dreamer is married, then this vision shows that God Almighty will grant him good offspring. And the girl. For an unmarried woman, if she sees in her dream that someone is giving her a handbag, then this dream indicates that someone will propose to this girl and she will be happy with this engagement and she sees that this person trusts her, and she will. Make her feel happy in her life and have a good husband. Interpretation of a dream about losing a wallet and then finding it in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that his wallet is lost and he cannot find it, this vision tells the dreamer that there are people who speak badly against him and are trying to find it.

title: Ibn Sirin’s most important interpretations of seeing menstrual blood in a dream for a divorced woman

preview.html: Seeing menstrual blood in a divorced woman’s dream. Menstrual blood is the contaminated blood that a woman’s body usually gets rid of every month in what is known as the menstrual cycle or menstruation. It is a natural substance that God Almighty has allocated to women and commanded them to wash and purify them after exhaling. . From the specified period of three to ten days, and seeing menstrual blood in a dream is one of the visions that attracts many girls and women and creates around it a lot of controversy and questions about knowing its meaning, especially if it is absolute, and we will do that. Learn this in detail in our article. Seeing menstrual blood in a divorced woman’s dream. The interpretation of seeing clean menstrual blood in a divorced woman’s dream generally indicates that she will get rid of the problems and fears that plague her life. While seeing contaminated menstrual blood in a dream can warn a divorced woman that she is facing problems. And disagreements with her family because of her insistence on her position on divorce. Seeing menstrual blood in a divorced woman’s dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin is one of the most important scholars who provide different interpretations that have many implications for seeing menstrual blood in a divorced woman’s dream, such as: Ibn Sirin believes that seeing menstrual blood in a woman’s dream A divorced woman bodes well for her. A dream about menstruation in a divorced woman’s dream symbolizes the beginning of a new stage in her life and getting rid of past memories. A divorced woman suffers from worries and sorrows in her life. If she sees that she is menstruating in a dream, God will change her state from sadness and anguish to psychological comfort and peace of mind. Seeing menstrual blood in a divorced woman’s dream by Ibn ShaheenIn most of his interpretation of seeing menstrual blood in a divorced woman’s dream, Ibn Shaheen showed positive connotations and promising meanings that reassure her, such as: Seeing menstrual blood in a divorced woman’s dream portends that she heard happy news and the death of anxiety and sadness. The flow of menstrual blood In a complete dream, it is a sign of getting rid of the underlying negative feelings that are disturbing her and affecting her psychological state. If a divorced woman is sick and sees that she is menstruating in a dream, she will soon recover and enjoy good health. Seeing menstrual blood on clothes in a dream for a divorced woman is among the many different cases of the appearance of blood Menstruation in a divorced woman’s dream, seeing it on her clothes. Here are some interpreters’ interpretations of this dream: Seeing menstrual blood on clothes in a dream can warn her of a major scandal caused by her ex-husband’s family. A woman who sees her clothes stained with menstrual blood in her dream after divorce feels deeply sad and clinging. With old memories of the past. Seeing menstrual blood on a divorced woman’s clothes in a dream could warn her that she has been subjected to fraud and deception. As for the interpretation of a dream about washing clothes and cleaning them of menstrual blood in a divorced woman’s dream, it is an indication that those close to her have been deceived and are staying away from her life and avoiding their vices. Vision. Menstrual bleeding in a divorced woman’s dream. Menstruation from the anus in a divorced woman’s dream is a disgusting vision that indicates her betrayal of her ex-husband and entering into an illicit relationship with another person. Seeing menstrual blood flowing naturally in a divorced woman’s dream symbolizes the acquisition of abundant money and the full restoration of her marital rights. The person warns

title: Interpretation of a dream about a doctor by Ibn Sirin and what it indicates

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a doctor by Ibn Sirin: A doctor is one who heals patients, God willing, and a doctor with many specialties such as pathology, surgery, nose, ear, children, and many other specialties. A hospital and a doctor in a dream for a single woman. If a girl sees that she is in the hospital and talking to the doctor, this is a good vision and indicates that she will get rid of worries and problems. And that she will achieve what she wants for her future. Seeing a doctor for a single woman shows the end of fatigue and hardship and the beginning of a new stage in her life. Visiting a doctor also indicates that she will marry a young man with good morals. Interpretation of dreams: I am a doctor in a dream. Seeing a doctor in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates her academic excellence and obtaining a position. Prestigious, it also denotes good luck and good health. Data about the article's elevation and high status. A married woman is a symbol of a life full of love and a stable married life. If a married woman sees her husband, she becomes a doctor in a dream, and this is evidence of her husband’s high status and distinguished social status among people and among neighbors and friends. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a doctor’s uniformIf a person sees in a dream that he is wearing a robe The doctor in a dream, this is a good vision and good news for the fortuneteller. This is evidence that this person has attended a higher college, obtained a doctorate degree, or is a prestigious position. Interpretation of seeing a gynecologist in a dream for a married woman: If anyone sees a nightgown wearing a white coat. This is evidence that this person has enrolled in one of the higher colleges, as they say, if that person is still studying in the secondary stage, and it can indicate that he has graduated safely, if that person is already studying in one of those colleges. Interpretation of a dream about a doctor visiting a woman Divorced. Seeing a doctor in a divorced woman’s dream indicates the dreamer’s good fortune and the death of difficulties and adversity. The vision also indicates the presence of loyal friends in her life who guide her to goodness and indicates the fulfillment of her dreams and desires. Seeing surgeons in a dream. Seeing surgeons in a dream indicates the death of worry and anxiety and recovery from illness for the patient. A handshake. Doctor in a dreamShaking hands with a doctor in a dream indicates recovery from illness, as well as relief from anxiety and sadness. Seeing a plastic surgeon in a dream Anyone who sees a plastic surgeon in a dream is evidence of many good things for the pioneer and improving the dreamer’s circumstances for the better. Seeing plastic surgery in a woman’s dream indicates Goodness and justice in the event that she has a balanced personality and cares for God, and plastic surgery or a plastic surgeon in the dream of an abnormal person indicates hypocrisy and evil. If it was a plastic surgery performed by a doctor and it was not successful or was not controlled, then it is problems, anxiety and problems in her life. And seeing a married woman She died while undergoing plastic surgery, so this indicates problems, marital quarrels, and instability. Visiting a doctor in a dream. Seeing a doctor or doctor in a dream is a good vision that indicates good luck and good news. Whoever sees a doctor in a dream will gain knowledge and understanding in religion, and will benefit those around him. People arrive
